Package skywaysolutions.app.rates

Interface IRateAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
IRepairable
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface IRateAccessor extends IRepairable
Provides an interface for rate access.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    • getConversionRate

      Gets the conversion rate for USD to the specified currency.
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency code.
      Returns:
      The conversion rate from USD.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The conversion rate retrieval failed.

      rate - The new conversion rate from USD.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The conversion rate storing failed.

    • getConvertableCurrencies

      String[] getConvertableCurrencies() throws CheckedException
      Lists the registered currencies that can be converted.
      Returns:
      The list of convertable currency codes.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The conversion rates could not be retrieved.
